com.stephentuso.welcome

Class WelcomeScreenHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stephentuso.welcome.WelcomeScreenHelper

  • public class WelcomeScreenHelper
extends Object
    Created by stephentuso on 11/15/15. Class that handles showing a welcome screen

public boolean show()

        true if the welcome screen was shown, false if it wasn't

public boolean show(int requestCode)

        Parameters:
        requestCode - The request code that will be returned with the result of the welcome screen in your Activity's onActivityResult
